name: Lost Waters
description:
Lost Waters is developed around a core of SINGLE-PLAYER HACK AND SLAY RHYTM fighting.
It's PROGRESSION system is ROGUE-LITE based, meaning you grind monsters to grow your Character stronger so you can survive longer to grow stronger.
For graphics it tries to mix CELSHADE TOON LOOKS with realistic animation style.
The story is a classic APOCALYPSE SZENARIO in which you take on the role of a new born species.

How would you feel if the world that you've grown to know would not exist anymore?
We write 3000 a.d. The Blue Planet ist not a source of life anymore.
Humanity has died with only a few survival-artists having survived the great apocalypse.
One of these groups of people are trying to survive on an old submarine whilst trying to create a humanoid species that can live underwater.
Some unterwater species though are trying to hold their ground after having claimed the entire flooded planet for themselves.
You must protect the human legacy and bring redemption to those currupted souls.
Carry your instrument as a Weapon and use powerful attacks to the beat to charge them with the power of music!
Will you be able to survive long enough to save a species?

Find out by playing the Alpha being released on 20.07.2022

Also join our Community Discord to give Feedback on our Alpha or find our Social Media to follow whats going on in Development! https://discord.gg/6VXNsbRbGj Release Date 22.08.2022
